reviewText: I really miss billie p. Not to take anything away from the new chicks, but she was great the first two seasons.
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: One of the most memorable fantastic series around.  It doesn't rely on special effects but rather really good writing.  The character of The Doctor is consistent with his predecessors and the actors bring their own unique spin on it.  Christopher Eccleston and David Tennant bring The Doctor to life and give him such presence. The interaction between The Doctor and all the recurring characters is tight and makes the series believable.Good writing and solid acting make this series awesome.
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: While there are some differents between the ORIGANEL and the NEW series they are small and can be overlooked. The new series is more special effects intensve and slighty less story driven but is still a good attempt to bring to TV a good SCI-FI night of entertainement.
summary: Doctor Who complete First and Second Series
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: I really love the new series, they are doing a fantastic job with it all.  I can hardly wait for season 4.  If you have never seen Doctor Who, I would suggest you do so, this also means that if you have the chance, watch the old shows too.James
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: With all the deserved hoopla over David Tennant as the 10th Doctor, people forget that when Dr. Who reemerged with Chris Eccleston as the 9th Doctor there was an equal amount of hoopla.  Now he's overlooked.  So buying these two years together, year one with Eccleston and year two with Tennant, bound together with Rose as the companion offer a good comparison.  I never want to forget Eccleston's perormance.  Had he continued, the series would have been every bit as good, albeit in a different direction.  He is the least quirky, or most "normal" of all the Doctors I am familiar with and that leant a level of believability to the character.  He's almost the "superhero space alien next door".  Kind, caring, and an ironic sense of humor, somewhat distant and mysterious with none of Tennant's manic qualities
summary: Great comparison of the two Doctors
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: This first and second season contain all of the criteria of a great science fiction series; full of wit and drama. Sparkling dialouge, great character development. The Characters are believable; the situations they are thrust into are exotic and complex, but more importantly, work to bring out the best or the worst of their personalities.  The epidode "The Empty Child" is one of my favorites, but to say any more about it would be to ruin it for the first time viewer. It's a good episode that will get you hooked.
summary: Great series, as good as Strar Trek was to America
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: Doctor Who is a fabulous British sci-fi show that can be enjoyed by the entire family. The Doctor is the last of his kind, a timne-lord, who travels through space and time in his "Bigger on the inside", TARDIS.  While the Doctor (Christopher Ecclston/David Tennant) usually flies alone, every now and then, he picks up a companion.  In the first episode, we meet the Doctor's new companion, Rose (Billie Piper).  The show is fast paced, funny, and most importantly, is does not take itself too seriously.
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: I was pleased about the quick delivery. I've been waiting for over a year to be able to get these dvds. Now to find time to sit and watch them.
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: I LOVE David Tennant as the Doctor, but it is nice to start from the beginning of the first series because one of the best things about this show is that it will tie in things throughout all the seasons.  It really is a wonderful series, probably the most enjoyable sci-fi show I've ever seen - dare I say it?  Up there with Firefly!  Rent it, buy it, but just don't miss out!
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: My son was very happy with the videos.  This is one of his favorite series.  I was very happy with the service I received.
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: This Rocks! Now ive been a fan of doctor who for a Very very long time, and when i saw that the BBC had made a New Doctor Who show, my interest was piqued! and i bought them after watching these 2 seasons they are Spectacular! with loads of DVD Extras, behind the scenes, interviews, and so much more its hard to list all of them! the Graphical Quality is Supreme, as well as the Audio, the special effects are Finally up to par with todays great effects. if you are a fan of doctor who, or know the daleks,K-9 and others this is a Must Own! especally if not for the sheer goodness of this then get it for the story background on the Doctor, The Time war and what happened between the daleks and the time lords! also even some insight into the Mighty Tardis *Time And Relative Dimension In Space TARDIS* woot gleaned that nugget of info just from the show! buy now before they go out of print and then you have to pay double (it still would be worth it) this is a Gem in anyones collection!
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: The Doctor is back and better than ever.  They kept the essence of the original show while updating it to make full use of the advances in technology and special effects.  It has humor, drama, strange aliens, fighting robots, and much more.  Sci Fi entertainment at its best.  I can't wait for seasons 3, 4, 5, etc to come out.
summary: The Doctor is better than ever
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2

reviewText: The show is fun, clever, moving, and funny- a great show for kids and adults! I've been looking for all the seasons separately, and they are quite expensive.  In fact, all the BBC shows tend to cost a lot more, but this 2 season set works out to be a lot lower. You are getting two seasons for the retail price of one!  A great deal! These are well worth watching over and over! And they include the behind the scenes Doctor Who Confidentials!
summary: A great deal for this combo!
Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Series 1-2
